function:
<%
    var result = null;
    if ('[$value||null]' != 'null') {
        result = await wxfns.transaction(eventCurrentTarget, 'save-page-data', '[$value]');
    }
    else
    {
        result = await wxfns.transaction(eventCurrentTarget, 'save-page-data', [$_text]);
    }
    if (result && result.rc != 'success') {
        return;
    }
    eventCurrentTarget.result = result;
    %>
